mapper.select: SELECT cod, move_date, obound_warehouse, obound_location, ibound_warehouse, ibound_location, employee_cod, product_cod, product_name, spec, unit FROM inventorymovement

SELECT cod, move_date, obound_warehouse, obound_location, ibound_warehouse, ibound_location, employee_cod, product_cod, product_name, spec, unit FROM inventorymovement WHERE move_date Between #{startDate} and #{endDate}
